tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The charts below show the performance of a bus company in terms of punctuality, both actual and target (what actually happened compared to what the company was trying to achieve), and the number of complaints and passengers.

images.altText: Chart showing bus company punctuality performance
Chart showing number of complaints and passengers

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Some people think movies should only be for entertainment. Others think that they should also have educational values. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
